markdownRemark.html:
You will definitely find something! It's just easier to see the disadvantages. Looks around: everything has disadvantages. At the same time, everything has advantages.

This is a poor approach to start with disadvantages. Instead, try to inspect the advantages. Then go further and try to be thankful for them.

This simple advice is an essential basis of being happy in this world.
